creator: kfujino@apache.org
text:
After r889716, 
session ID is changed on authentication. 
(default of changeSessionIdOnAuthentication is true. )
But DeltaManager doesn't notify other cluster nodes. 

Therefore, non-primary node keeps having old session ID. 
And, can not replicate of change of session attribute notified by new session ID. 

The workaround is ...
override changeSessionId method, and notify to change session ID.

BackupManager is OK. 
This problem is DeltaManager only.

Best regards.

Created attachment 25596
I made a patch.
creator: kfujino@apache.org

text: Fixed in trunk and proposed for 6.0.x and 5.5.x.
creator: kfujino@apache.org

text: Since this is fixed in 7.0.x (it will be included in 7.0.1 onwards) move this issue to 6.0.x
creator: markt@apache.org

text: This fix applied to 6.0, will be in 6.0.28 onwards.
creator: kfujino@apache.org

text: This fix applied to 5.5, will be in 5.5.30 onwards.
creator: kfujino@apache.org
